Simulation3D

Class Max

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      • Simulation3D.Max
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Simulation

    public abstract class Max
extends com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
    Max is a MaxObject's abstraction that provide basic stuffs for it's children. Please note that Max is an abstract class and each children will be an instantiable Max Object.
    Since:
    2.0

      • nowhereMatrix

        public com.cycling74.jitter.JitterMatrix nowhereMatrix
        Nowhere matrix : a two plane 2D matrix with one cell per plane. Values are both Float.MAX_VALUE This matrix is used because it's impossible to send a blank matrix in max. Use it when you want to notify that nothing is outputed (that is different to not output).
